General.Name: Mnc Kapital Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT MNC Kapital Indonesia Tbk, through its subsidiaries, provides various financial products and services in Indonesia. The company offers SME, consumer, and wholesale banking services; credit and debit cards; consumer financing, including motor vehicles and property financing, multi-purpose financing, and factoring; and fund investment, multi finance, brokerage and underwriting, life and general insurance, and leasing products. It also provides equity trading, fixed income, investment banking, and research services; trade execution and settlement services, corporate access, capital raising, and cross border merger and acquisition for equities and fixed income instruments; payment gateways; property leasing; and information technology services. The company was formerly known as PT Bhakti Capital Indonesia Tbk and changed its name to PT MNC Kapital Indonesia Tbk in November 2012. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT MNC Kapital Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT MNC Asia Holding Tbk.
